name: Seek investment
description: Seek investment have invested in game-changing businesses from founding through to IPO, with a focus on software, internet, climate and crypto. Over the past 15 years we have deployed over $2 billion, with check sizes ranging from $1 to $50 million. Our investments span across North America, Latin America, Europe and Asia.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: Seek is a global investment firm focused on software, internet and climate
ShortDescription: Seek investment have invested in game-changing businesses from founding through to IPO, with a focus on software, internet, climate and crypto.
enhanced_description: Seek investment is a global investment firm established in 2015, headquartered in London, GB. Over the past 15 years, they have deployed over $2 billion, with individual investments ranging from $1 million to $50 million, supporting game-changing businesses from their founding stages through to IPO. Their investment focus spans software, internet, climate, and crypto sectors across North America, Latin America, Europe, and Asia. Within the context of HR technology, Seek investment is categorized under Recruiting, with its activities aligned with business objectives such as boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity, accelerating talent acquisition and efficiency, and reducing the cost of hiring qualified employees.
key_use_cases: Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
Reducing costs associated with hiring qualified employees
competitive_advantages: Extensive capital deployment with over $2 billion invested
Flexible investment check sizes ranging from $1 million to $50 million
Global investment reach across North America, Latin America, Europe, and Asia
Specialized investment focus on software, internet, climate, and crypto sectors
Supports businesses across their full lifecycle, from founding through to IPO
roi_benefits: Increased hiring manager confidence and productivity
Faster and more efficient hiring of top talent
Reduced cost of hiring qualified employees
